text: Hala Sportowa Częstochowa is a sport, show and fair arena in Częstochowa, Poland. In sport it is primarily used for volleyball, and also concerts. The arena was officially opened on September 29, 2012, during the SuperCup 2012 volleyball match – PGE Skra Bełchatów vs Asseco Resovia Rzeszów.Superpuchar Polski siatkarzy w nowej hali w Częstochowie - dziennikzachodni.pl - 06-07-2012 Occasionally it is a place of playing matches of FIVB Volleyball World League. ==Notes== ==External links== * Official site of Hala Sportowa Częstochowa Category:AZS Częstochowa Category:Indoor arenas in Poland Category:Buildings and structures in Częstochowa Category:Sports venues in Silesian Voivodeship Category:Volleyball venues in Poland Category:Sport in Częstochowa
title: Hala Sportowa Częstochowa
